isis.stitle: HOOD, GRILLE, FENDERS, BUMPER AND RUNNING BOARDS - MXT - REMOVE AND INSTALL - Running Boards

svcprocinfo.para: The running boards are located on both sides of the cab from the front wheel well to the rear wheel well.

caution.para: The running boards are very heavy. Support the running boards with a suitable lifting device prior to removal. Failure to comply could result in serious injury to personnel or damage to equipment.

step1.para: Remove four bolts and nuts (Item 1, Figure 48) from the running board front bracket (Item 2, Figure 48).
Remove the remaining four bolts and nuts (Item 1, Figure 48) from the running board rear bracket (Item 2, Figure 48). Remove the running board.
Repeat steps 1 and 2 for the remaining running board.

svcsubproc.title: Running Boards - Installation
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 48 for items in parentheses.

caution.para: The running boards are very heavy. Support the running boards with a suitable lifting device prior to installation. Failure to comply could result in serious injury to personnel or damage to equipment.

step1.para: Align the running board front and rear brackets (Item 2) in position on the frame and secure with one nut and bolt in the front and rear brackets to secure the running board (Item 3).
Install the remaining six nuts and bolts (Item 1) in the front and rear running board brackets (Item 2).
Repeat steps 1 and 2 for the remaining running board.
